## View model findings

To see all project findings for all models: 

1. In the left sidebar, click **Model Findings**.

   In the page that opens, you can see a list of all model findings, including information for:

   - Title
   - Severity
   - Status
   - Inventory model
   - Risk area
   - Assigned to
   - Due date

2. Click on any model finding for more information, including the proposed remediation plan.

## Filter project findings

By default, all model findings for all models are displayed and sorted by creation date, with the latest findings displayed first. To narrow down the findings to only those you want to see, apply some filter:

1. On the **Model Findings** page, click {{< fa filter >}} **Filter**.

2. On the **Select your filters** dialog that opens, select your filter criteria for:

   - Status
   - Model inventory
   - Risk area
   - Business units
   - Severity
   - Assigned to
